name: Alfa Laval Aalborg A/S
bossPosition: Vice President Marine Division Business Control
goal:
The Marine Division (MD) develops the global growth strategy for Alfa Laval’s activities towards the Marine industries.

The Division includes both capital and aftermarket sales within Marine Offshore Pumping Systems, Marine & Offshore Systems and Marine Equipment, Operations, Product Centre Boilers and support functions.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Transport
euInitiatives:
MRV
Sulphur Directive
Water Framework Directive
NOx regulation of the marine industry
Black Carbon and PM in relation to shipping
Shipping CO2 footprint/GHG
